source.sqlReaderQuery:
select distinct B_CLASSNAME, B_CREDATE, B_UPDDATE, B_CREATOR, B_PUBID, B_SOURCEID, OPERATIONAL_STATUS, TYPE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, 
SHIP_TO_NUM, MODEL, VERSION, TIME_ZONE, LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE, RAW_PHONE, RAW_CS_PHONE, RAW_FAX, SMS_CODE, SOFT_OPEN_DATE,
 GRAND_OPEN_DATE, CLOSE_DATE, AREA_UNIT_OF_MEASURE, BUILDING_SQFT, WAREHOUSE_SQFT, SHOWROOM_SQFT, OFFICE_SQFT, NUM_OF_DOCK_DOORS,
  RETAIL_SYSTEM_NUM, ENTERPRISE_STORE_NUM, F_GOOGLE_ID as location_number, PROSPECT_ID, DMA_ID, DMA, MSA_ID, MSA, MARKET, REGION, DOMESTIC_CATEGORY,
   COUNTRY_CATEGORY, FP_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE, 
FS_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE,'' as B_DELETETYPE,
cast(Null as datetime) as B_DELETEDATE,
'' as B_DELETEAUTHOR,
cast (Null as uniqueidentifier) as B_DELETEOPERATION
from retail.v_Site_Storemaster_incremental
where soft_open_date <= CURRENT_DATE

/*
where upper(operational_status) ='ACTIVE'
UNION 

select B_CLASSNAME, B_CREDATE, B_UPDDATE, B_CREATOR, B_PUBID, B_SOURCEID, OPERATIONAL_STATUS, TYPE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, 
SHIP_TO_NUM, MODEL, VERSION, TIME_ZONE, LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE, RAW_PHONE, RAW_CS_PHONE, RAW_FAX, SMS_CODE, SOFT_OPEN_DATE,
 GRAND_OPEN_DATE, CLOSE_DATE, AREA_UNIT_OF_MEASURE, BUILDING_SQFT, WAREHOUSE_SQFT, SHOWROOM_SQFT, OFFICE_SQFT, NUM_OF_DOCK_DOORS,
  RETAIL_SYSTEM_NUM, ENTERPRISE_STORE_NUM, F_GOOGLE_ID as location_number, PROSPECT_ID, DMA_ID, DMA, MSA_ID, MSA, MARKET, REGION, DOMESTIC_CATEGORY,
   COUNTRY_CATEGORY, FP_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE, 
FS_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE,
'SOFT_DELETE' as B_DELETETYPE,
getdate() as B_DELETEDATE,
'Semadmin' as B_DELETEAUTHOR,
cast(newid() as uniqueidentifier) as B_DELETEOPERATION
from retail.v_Site_Storemaster_incremental
where upper(operational_status) ='INACTIVE'
*/

SELECT
'LegalEntity' AS B_CLASSNAME,
GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,
GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'SMARTSHEET' AS B_PUBID,
legal_entity_id AS LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
name AS NAME,
type AS TYPE,
lic_contact AS LIC_CONTACT,
lic_contact_email AS LIC_CONTACT_EMAIL,
raw_lic_contact_phone AS RAW_LIC_CONTACT_PHONE,
raw_addr_line1 AS RAW_ADDR_LINE1,
raw_addr_line2 AS RAW_ADDR_LINE2,
raw_city AS RAW_CITY,
raw_state AS RAW_STATE,
raw_state_code AS RAW_STATE_CODE,
raw_country AS RAW_COUNTRY,
raw_country_code AS RAW_COUNTRY_CODE,
raw_postal_code AS RAW_POSTAL_CODE,
raw_longitude AS RAW_LONGITUDE,
raw_latitude AS RAW_LATITUDE,
mailing_addr_line1 AS MAILING_ADDR_LINE1,
mailing_addr_line2 AS MAILING_ADDR_LINE2,
mailing_city AS MAILING_CITY,
mailing_state AS MAILING_STATE,
mailing_state_code AS MAILING_STATE_CODE,
mailing_country AS MAILING_COUNTRY,
mailing_country_code AS MAILING_COUNTRY_CODE,
mailing_postal_code AS MAILING_POSTAL_CODE,
os_legal_entity_id AS OS_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
company_code AS COMPANY_CODE
FROM [Retail].[v_StoreMaster_Inc_Legal_Entity]
 WITH(NOLOCK)

SELECT
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDDATE,
B_CREATOR,
B_PUBID,
SITE_ADDITIONAL_INFO_ID,
opr_monday_start_time AS OPR_MONDAY_START_TIME,
opr_monday_end_time AS OPR_MONDAY_END_TIME,
opr_tuesday_start_time AS OPR_TUESDAY_START_TIME,
opr_tuesday_end_time AS OPR_TUESDAY_END_TIME,
opr_wednesday_start_time AS OPR_WEDNESDAY_START_TIME,
opr_wednesday_end_time AS OPR_WEDNESDAY_END_TIME,
opr_thursday_start_time AS OPR_THURSDAY_START_TIME,
opr_thursday_end_time AS OPR_THURSDAY_END_TIME,
opr_friday_start_time AS OPR_FRIDAY_START_TIME,
opr_friday_end_time AS OPR_FRIDAY_END_TIME,
opr_saturday_start_time AS OPR_SATURDAY_START_TIME,
opr_saturday_end_time AS OPR_SATURDAY_END_TIME,
opr_sunday_start_time AS OPR_SUNDAY_START_TIME,
opr_sunday_end_time AS OPR_SUNDAY_END_TIME
--change_type
FROM Retail.v_SiteAdditionalInfo_Incremental WITH(NOLOCK)

select HS_OPC_TRACKING_ID,B_CLASSNAME,B_CREDATE,B_UPDDATE,B_CREATOR,B_PUBID,B_SOURCEID,OPERATION_ID,PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER,ERP_DATABASE_NAME,ERP_SYSTEM_NAME,EFFECTIVE_START_DATE,EFFECTIVE_END_DATE,LEGACY_LOCATION_ID,SITE_NAME,COMP_FLAG,ENTERPRISE_FLAG,TRAFFIC_SYSTEM_ID,LIC_TERRITORY,TUA_EXPIRATION_DATE,NOTES,OS_ID,OS_LOCATION_ID,SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1,SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE2,SITE_RAW_CITY,SITE_RAW_STATE,SITE_RAW_STATE_CODE,SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE,SITE_RAW_COUNTRY,SITE_RAW_COUNTRY_CODE,
SITE_RAW_LATITUDE,SITE_RAW_LONGITUDE,F_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,FP_SITE_ID,FS_SITE_ID from (
SELECT 
    cast(newid() as uniqueidentifier) HS_OPC_TRACKING_ID,
    B_CLASSNAME,
	B_CREDATE,
	B_UPDDATE,
	B_CREATOR,
	B_PUBID,
	B_SOURCEID,
	 operation_id AS OPERATION_ID,
	 primary_profit_center AS PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER,
	 erp_database_name AS ERP_DATABASE_NAME,
	 erp_system_name AS ERP_SYSTEM_NAME,
	 effective_start_date AS EFFECTIVE_START_DATE,
	 effective_end_date AS EFFECTIVE_END_DATE,
	 legacy_location_id AS LEGACY_LOCATION_ID,
	 site_name AS SITE_NAME,
	 CAST(comp_flag AS BIT) AS COMP_FLAG,
	 CAST(enterprise_flag AS BIT) AS ENTERPRISE_FLAG,
	 traffic_system_id AS TRAFFIC_SYSTEM_ID,
	 lic_territory AS LIC_TERRITORY,
	 tua_expiration_date AS TUA_EXPIRATION_DATE,
	 notes AS NOTES,
	 os_id AS OS_ID,
	 os_location_id AS OS_LOCATION_ID,
	 raw_addr_line1 AS SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1,
	 raw_addr_line2 AS SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE2,
	 raw_city AS SITE_RAW_CITY,
	 raw_state AS SITE_RAW_STATE,
	 raw_state_code AS SITE_RAW_STATE_CODE,
	 raw_postal_code AS SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE,
	 raw_country AS SITE_RAW_COUNTRY,
	 raw_country_code AS SITE_RAW_COUNTRY_CODE,
	 raw_latitude AS SITE_RAW_LATITUDE,
	 raw_longitude AS SITE_RAW_LONGITUDE,
	 legal_entity_id AS F_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
	 FP_SITE_ID,
	 FS_SITE_ID ,
     ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY B_SOURCEID ORDER BY effective_start_date DESC) AS rn     
FROM Retail.v_hs_opc_tracking_incremental)a
where rn=1

DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_SiteMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT

SELECT
'LegalEntity' AS B_CLASSNAME,
GETDATE() AS B_CREDATE,
GETDATE() AS B_UPDDATE,
'semadmin' AS B_CREATOR,
'SMARTSHEET' AS B_PUBID,
legal_entity_id AS LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
name AS NAME,
type AS TYPE,
lic_contact AS LIC_CONTACT,
lic_contact_email AS LIC_CONTACT_EMAIL,
raw_lic_contact_phone AS RAW_LIC_CONTACT_PHONE,
raw_addr_line1 AS RAW_ADDR_LINE1,
raw_addr_line2 AS RAW_ADDR_LINE2,
raw_city AS RAW_CITY,
raw_state AS RAW_STATE,
raw_state_code AS RAW_STATE_CODE,
raw_country AS RAW_COUNTRY,
raw_country_code AS RAW_COUNTRY_CODE,
raw_postal_code AS RAW_POSTAL_CODE,
raw_longitude AS RAW_LONGITUDE,
raw_latitude AS RAW_LATITUDE,
mailing_addr_line1 AS MAILING_ADDR_LINE1,
mailing_addr_line2 AS MAILING_ADDR_LINE2,
mailing_city AS MAILING_CITY,
mailing_state AS MAILING_STATE,
mailing_state_code AS MAILING_STATE_CODE,
mailing_country AS MAILING_COUNTRY,
mailing_country_code AS MAILING_COUNTRY_CODE,
mailing_postal_code AS MAILING_POSTAL_CODE,
os_legal_entity_id AS OS_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
company_code AS COMPANY_CODE,
'1' as Current_flag
FROM [Retail].[v_StoreMaster_Inc_Legal_Entity]
 WITH(NOLOCK)

select distinct B_CLASSNAME, B_CREDATE, B_UPDDATE, B_CREATOR, B_PUBID, B_SOURCEID, OPERATIONAL_STATUS, TYPE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, 
SHIP_TO_NUM, MODEL, VERSION, TIME_ZONE, LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE, RAW_PHONE, RAW_CS_PHONE, RAW_FAX, SMS_CODE, SOFT_OPEN_DATE,
 GRAND_OPEN_DATE, CLOSE_DATE, AREA_UNIT_OF_MEASURE, BUILDING_SQFT, WAREHOUSE_SQFT, SHOWROOM_SQFT, OFFICE_SQFT, NUM_OF_DOCK_DOORS,
  RETAIL_SYSTEM_NUM, ENTERPRISE_STORE_NUM, F_GOOGLE_ID, PROSPECT_ID, DMA_ID, DMA, MSA_ID, MSA, MARKET, REGION, DOMESTIC_CATEGORY, 
  COUNTRY_CATEGORY, FP_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE, FS_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE, 
change_type, record_insert_date, record_update_date
from retail.v_Site_Storemaster_incremental
where upper(operational_status) ='ACTIVE'

SELECT 
    cast(newid() as uniqueidentifier) AS HS_OPC_TRACKING_ID,
    B_CLASSNAME,
	B_CREDATE,
	B_UPDDATE,
	B_CREATOR,
	 operation_id AS OPERATION_ID,
	 primary_profit_center AS PRIMARY_PROFIT_CENTER,
	 erp_database_name AS ERP_DATABASE_NAME,
	 erp_system_name AS ERP_SYSTEM_NAME,
	 effective_start_date AS EFFECTIVE_START_DATE,
	 effective_end_date AS EFFECTIVE_END_DATE,
	 legacy_location_id AS LEGACY_LOCATION_ID,
	 site_name AS SITE_NAME,
	 CAST(comp_flag AS BIT) AS COMP_FLAG,
	 CAST(enterprise_flag AS BIT) AS ENTERPRISE_FLAG,
	 traffic_system_id AS TRAFFIC_SYSTEM_ID,
	 lic_territory AS LIC_TERRITORY,
	 tua_expiration_date AS TUA_EXPIRATION_DATE,
	 notes AS NOTES,
	 os_id AS OS_ID,
	 os_location_id AS OS_LOCATION_ID,
	 raw_addr_line1 AS SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE1,
	 raw_addr_line2 AS SITE_RAW_ADDR_LINE2,
	 raw_city AS SITE_RAW_CITY,
	 raw_state AS SITE_RAW_STATE,
	 raw_state_code AS SITE_RAW_STATE_CODE,
	 raw_postal_code AS SITE_RAW_POSTAL_CODE,
	 raw_country AS SITE_RAW_COUNTRY,
	 raw_country_code AS SITE_RAW_COUNTRY_CODE,
	 raw_latitude AS SITE_RAW_LATITUDE,
	 raw_longitude AS SITE_RAW_LONGITUDE,
	 legal_entity_id AS F_LEGAL_ENTITY_ID,
	 FP_SITE_ID,
	 FS_SITE_ID ,   
     CHANGE_TYPE  as CHANGE_TYPE 
FROM Retail.v_hs_opc_tracking_incremental

SELECT
B_CLASSNAME,
B_CREDATE,
B_UPDDATE,
B_CREATOR,
B_PUBID,
SITE_ADDITIONAL_INFO_ID,
opr_monday_start_time AS OPR_MONDAY_START_TIME,
opr_monday_end_time AS OPR_MONDAY_END_TIME,
opr_tuesday_start_time AS OPR_TUESDAY_START_TIME,
opr_tuesday_end_time AS OPR_TUESDAY_END_TIME,
opr_wednesday_start_time AS OPR_WEDNESDAY_START_TIME,
opr_wednesday_end_time AS OPR_WEDNESDAY_END_TIME,
opr_thursday_start_time AS OPR_THURSDAY_START_TIME,
opr_thursday_end_time AS OPR_THURSDAY_END_TIME,
opr_friday_start_time AS OPR_FRIDAY_START_TIME,
opr_friday_end_time AS OPR_FRIDAY_END_TIME,
opr_saturday_start_time AS OPR_SATURDAY_START_TIME,
opr_saturday_end_time AS OPR_SATURDAY_END_TIME,
opr_sunday_start_time AS OPR_SUNDAY_START_TIME,
opr_sunday_end_time AS OPR_SUNDAY_END_TIME,
change_type
FROM Retail.v_SiteAdditionalInfo_Incremental WITH(NOLOCK)

select distinct B_CLASSNAME, B_CREDATE, B_UPDDATE, B_CREATOR, B_PUBID, B_SOURCEID, OPERATIONAL_STATUS, TYPE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, 
SHIP_TO_NUM, MODEL, VERSION, TIME_ZONE, LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE, RAW_PHONE, RAW_CS_PHONE, RAW_FAX, SMS_CODE, SOFT_OPEN_DATE,
 GRAND_OPEN_DATE, CLOSE_DATE, AREA_UNIT_OF_MEASURE, BUILDING_SQFT, WAREHOUSE_SQFT, SHOWROOM_SQFT, OFFICE_SQFT, NUM_OF_DOCK_DOORS,
  RETAIL_SYSTEM_NUM, ENTERPRISE_STORE_NUM, F_GOOGLE_ID, PROSPECT_ID, DMA_ID, DMA, MSA_ID, MSA, MARKET, REGION, DOMESTIC_CATEGORY,
   COUNTRY_CATEGORY, FP_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE, 
FS_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE,'SOFT_DELETE' as B_DELETETYPE,
getdate() as B_DELETEDATE,
'Semadmin' as B_DELETEAUTHOR,
cast(newid() as uniqueidentifier) as B_DELETEOPERATION
--change_type, record_insert_date, record_update_date
from retail.v_Site_Storemaster_incremental
where upper(operational_status) ='INACTIVE'
and CLOSE_DATE <= CURRENT_DATE

select distinct B_CLASSNAME, B_CREDATE, B_UPDDATE, B_CREATOR, B_PUBID, B_SOURCEID, OPERATIONAL_STATUS, TYPE, ACCOUNT_NUMBER, 
SHIP_TO_NUM, MODEL, VERSION, TIME_ZONE, LOCAL_CURRENCY_CODE, RAW_PHONE, RAW_CS_PHONE, RAW_FAX, SMS_CODE, SOFT_OPEN_DATE,
 GRAND_OPEN_DATE, CLOSE_DATE, AREA_UNIT_OF_MEASURE, BUILDING_SQFT, WAREHOUSE_SQFT, SHOWROOM_SQFT, OFFICE_SQFT, NUM_OF_DOCK_DOORS,
  RETAIL_SYSTEM_NUM, ENTERPRISE_STORE_NUM, F_GOOGLE_ID, PROSPECT_ID, DMA_ID, DMA, MSA_ID, MSA, MARKET, REGION, DOMESTIC_CATEGORY, 
  COUNTRY_CATEGORY, FP_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE, FS_SUPPORTING_WAREHOUSE, 
change_type, record_insert_date, record_update_date
from retail.v_Site_Storemaster_incremental
where upper(operational_status) ='INACTIVE'

DECLARE @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT DECIMAL
EXECUTE [dbo].[GET_NEW_LOADID]
@RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT OUTPUT
,@P_DATA_LOCATION_NAME = 'Retail_SiteMaster'
,@P_PROGRAM_NAME = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_LOAD_DESCRIPTION = 'RetailSiteDataLoad'
,@P_USERNAME = 'semadmin'
SELECT @RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT AS RETURN_VALUE_ARGUMENT
